alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; San Jacinto; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 3:57PM CDT until May 01 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Montgomery County in southeastern Texas... Southwestern San Jacinto County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Walker County in southeastern Texas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cut And Shoot, or 7 miles northeast of Conroe, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Quarter sized hail has been observed with this thunderstorm near Woodloch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Conroe, Cut And Shoot and Evergreen. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
